description: Partial sums of the Collatz sequence.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = Sum(i from 0 to n) Collatz(i) a(n) = a(n-1) + Collatz(n)
prog: (PARI) A006577(n)=if(n<0, 0, s=n; c=0; while(s>1, s=if(s%2, 3*s+1, s/2); c++); c)s=0; vector(100,n, s+=A006577(n) ) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 11 2015
author: Felix Goldberg (felixg(AT)tx.technion.ac.il), Dec 26 2000
